source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Introduction to Indian Folk Art: How to make Gond Paintings
items.headline: Cultural significance of Gond Paintings in India and experiencing the hard work that goes into making one.
objectives_summary: What is a Gond Painting
How to make a Gond Painting
An Indian Folk Art Form

items.title: Paint snowy mountains with watercolour: easy, full guidance
items.headline: Learn how to paint beautiful sunny mountains, explore the watercolour techniques and get the painting you'd be proud of
objectives_summary: watercolour painting
different type of watercolour washes
dry-brush technique

items.title: Crochet Pattern Granny Square - the easiest ever
items.headline: Learn the basics of crochet in detail and create your own handmade piece quickly and easily
objectives_summary: How to master the most crucial fundamentals of crochet
How to master the two most important stitches you will ever need to use
The best way to quickly and easily change the colour of yarn while you're working

items.title: Making Glittering Geodes from Epoxy Resin
items.headline: Multiple styles, shapes and sizes - not just one!
objectives_summary: How to use epoxy resin to make a crystal geode art project

visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart

items.headline: Illustrating Food & Drink in Watercolor and Pencil
objectives_summary: How to draw basic food and drink shapes using perspective and simple geometry
How to draw details once the major shapes are established
How to use watercolor to quickly bring drawings to life when sketching at the table

items.title: Watercolour Painting - Pen/Ink and Wash Sketching ESSENTIALS
items.headline: Learn Pen and Wash by painting some Landscapes of the beautiful Russian town of Suzdal
objectives_summary: What essential materials you need for pen and wash
How to sketch with an ink pen
Essential watercolor painting techniques

items.title: Poi: 3 basic moves
items.headline: Claim your space with grace
objectives_summary: The 3 basic moves of poi dance

items.title: Basic and Comprehensive Tutorial of Facial Components Sketch
items.headline: Sketch of eyes, eyebrows, nose, lips; ears and hair Shading technique with pencil & Conte powder Pencil shading& drawing
objectives_summary: Introduction of the tools needed for face sketch
Basic sketch and shading tutorial with a variety of brushes
Learn to work with Etude eraser to create light

items.title: Learn to Draw Mandalas as a Mindfulness tool
items.headline: Explore your creativity with the Sacred Art of Mandalas and step into your daily life more relaxed, grounded & clear
objectives_summary: How to create your own Mandala as a Mindfulness tool.
Defining Mindfulness & its characteristics.
Three Main Points of Applied Mindfulness.

items.title: Simple Magic Tricks Anyone Can Do
items.headline: A How-To Video Course Teaching Jaw-Dropping Magic Effects that are Simple to Learn and Perform.
objectives_summary: Perform Miracles
Be Less Socially Inept
Meet New People

items.title: How to Write Your Memoirs

visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of the International Digital Nomad Society
visible_instructors.name: Johnny
visible_instructors.title: Johnny Ray

items.headline: A Complete Guide to Create and Tell You Story, the One that Must be Told.
objectives_summary: Understand exactly what a memoir is and is not
Be able to search for and recall the memories of their life
Determine what are thier main turning points in their lif thatshould be told to others

items.title: Paint a landscape watercolor by mixing just THREE colors

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Using the three colours used in the printing industry to paint this. A very limited palette, & a bit of black, amazing
objectives_summary: Master an even better understanding of painting with a limited palette in watercolours.
Use printers colours, magenta, cyan, yellow and some black and get all the colours you need.
Get a better understanding of colour values when painting with watercolours

items.title: CREATIVE FLORAL WEDDING DESIGN
items.headline: WHIMSICAL DESIGN
objectives_summary: You will learn the essentials of floristry and at the end of the course you will be able to make your own floral designs

items.title: Beginners watercolor, Mastering the watercolor technique
items.headline: Working on watercolor basics with making 2 paintings / explaining how to make highlights
objectives_summary: How to paint with watercolors
Students will learn how watercolor paints work with the water and so how to use them effectively
How to paint watercolors flowers/landscape on paper

items.title: Painting Easy Watercolor Sweets & Treats! Beginner Level
items.headline: Painting gorgeous sweets is easy! Learn simple and fun techniques for loose & yummy paintings! Painting for beginners.
objectives_summary: How to paint gorgeous sweets!
New watercolor painting techniques!
Practice painting loosely, intuitively, & expressively!

items.title: Watercolor lesson - Lighthouse by the sea - Landscape

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: We paint with watercolor! Seascape - waves, sea foam, splashes ... clouds and rays of the light!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint watercolor landscape: how to plan layers for it, which parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn watercolor painting techniques: wet-in-wet, layering, glazing, detailing, watercolor lifting, napkin tricks
Learn watercolor painting basics: air perspective, values, color mixing, lifting pigments, issue fixing
